io.oasp.module.jpa.dataaccess.base

Class AbstractDao<E extends net.sf.mmm.util.entity.api.PersistenceEntity<Long>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.oasp.module.jpa.dataaccess.base.AbstractGenericDao<Long,E>
      • io.oasp.module.jpa.dataaccess.base.AbstractDao<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - is the generic type of the PersistenceEntity. Should be derived from AbstractPersistenceEntity.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Dao<E>, GenericDao<Long,E>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractMasterDataDao

    public abstract class AbstractDao<E extends net.sf.mmm.util.entity.api.PersistenceEntity<Long>>
extends AbstractGenericDao<Long,E>
implements Dao<E>
    Abstract base implementation of Dao interface.
    Author:
    hohwille
